Group.name: WACCM
Group.description: WACCM (Whole Atmosphere Community Climate Model) users

Group.name: CCCMA
Group.description: CCCMA group: Please do not apply for membership in this group. Data will be made available to CMIP5 users in the near future.

Group.name: CMIP5 Commercial
Group.description: Users of CMIP5 data possibly for commercial purposes

Group.name: NARCCAP
Group.description: NARCCAP (North American Regional Climate Change Assessment Program) users

Group.name: CMIP5 Research
Group.description: Users of CMIP5 data for non-commercial research purposes only

Group.name: NCCS
Group.description: NASA Center for Climate Simulation: Please do not apply for membership in this group. Data will be made available to CMIP5 users in the near future.
